dmca.title: Att. Notice of Copyright Infringement: arunalab.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Alan Winstanley [mailto:alan@epemag.demon.co.uk] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2007 8:06 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Att. Notice of Copyright Infringement: arunalab.com
Importance: High

 

Dear Sirs

Everyday Practical Electronics Magazine ('EPE')

We have re-sent our Complaint in the attached letter in accordance with
your AUP requirement. We look forward to your early reply.

Regards,



-- 
Alan Winstanley  EPE Magazine Online Editor
email alan@epemag.demon.co.uk
web www.epemag.co.uk

<http://www.epemag.co.uk/> This communication is intended only for the
use of the Company and/or person(s)
("The intended recipient(s)") to whom it is addressed. You may not
forward it to any other
Party without the writer's permission. It may contain information which
is privileged and
confidential within the meaning of applicable law. It may also contain
technical information or 
comments that are for guidance only which should not be deemed to be a
considered opinion.
If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender as soon
as possible.

--------------

Wimborne Publishing Ltd.
408 Wimborne Road East
Ferndown, DORSET
BH22 9ND
UNITED KINGDOM

Tel. 01202 873872   Fax 01202 874562
www.epemag.co.uk   
Email enquiries@wimborne.co.uk
Registered in England No. 1971411
Registered Office: 408 Wimborne Road East, Ferndown, Dorset BH22 9ND UNITED KINGDOM


To:
Andrea Z.Almeida
ThePlantet.com Internet Services Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110, 
DALLAS
TX 75207								Ref Arw/ DCMA
USA									April 24th, 2007


Dear Sirs


Notice of Copyright Infringement

We are Wimborne Publishing Ltd, UK publishers of the magazine Everyday Practical Electronics ("EPE"). More details of our magazine at www.epemag.wimborne.co.uk  and our USA partners are at www.epemag.com.

I am employed as the Online Editor of Wimborne Publishing Ltd., managing all Internet-related affairs of the Company and its publications and I have the full authority to take the measures necessary to protect the Company
dmca.principal_name: Wimborne Publishing Ltd. (for Everyday Practical Electronics Magazine)
